title: How to Make a Mii Look Like a Cat

steps.headline: Change your Mii's top to brown.
steps.description: Choose to name your Mii now if you want to.

steps.headline: Make your Mii the shortest and the fattest.
Change your Mii to the darkest skin colour.
Go to the makeup section.
steps.description: Choose the makeup on the bottom right.

steps.headline: Go to the hair section.
steps.description: Choose the hair that is on the third page and on the top row in the middle. Leave the colour brown.

steps.headline: Go to the eyebrow section.
steps.description: Go to the second page and choose the box on the bottom right. Leave the colour brown.

steps.headline: Go to the eye section.
steps.description: Go to the third page and choose the eyes on the fourth page, bottom row on the left. Change the colour to whatever colour you want.

steps.headline: Go to the nose section and change the nose to the triangle.
Go to the lip section.
steps.description: Go to the second page and choose the the lips that are on the bottom row to the left.

text: Change your Mii's top to brown. Choose to name your Mii now if you want to. Make your Mii the shortest and the fattest.  Change your Mii to the darkest skin colour.  Go to the makeup section. Choose the makeup on the bottom right. Go to the hair section. Choose the hair that is on the third page and on the top row in the middle. Leave the colour brown. Go to the eyebrow section. Go to the second page and choose the box on the bottom right. Leave the colour brown. Go to the eye section. Go to the third page and choose the eyes on the fourth page, bottom row on the left. Change the colour to whatever colour you want. Go to the nose section and change the nose to the triangle.  Go to the lip section. Go to the second page and choose the the lips that are on the bottom row to the left.
